title: Week 17 preview
itunes:title: Week 17 preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler & Chris Wesseling – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL including Steve Smith’s possible retirement, and the Jaguars meeting with former head coach Tom Coughlin. Plus, the heroes go game-by-game previewing each Week 17 matchup, and revealing which team is their “Lock of the Week”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
